# Khalil Charfi - Full-Stack Engineer Portfolio

> Portfolio of Khalil Charfi, a Full-Stack Engineer specializing in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud architecture. This site showcases professional experience, technical skills, projects, publications, and certifications.

## About Khalil Charfi

Khalil Charfi is a Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in building scalable web and mobile applications. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud architecture, and user-centric design.

- [Portfolio Home](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/): Main landing page with overview
- [About Section](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#about): Professional background and key highlights
- [Contact](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#contact): Get in touch via email or social media

## Core Technical Skills

- [Skills Overview](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#skills): Comprehensive breakdown of technical expertise

**Frontend Technologies**: React, TypeScript, Vue.js, Next.js, Modern CSS, Responsive Design

**Backend Technologies**: Node.js, Python, Java, REST APIs, GraphQL, Microservices

**Cloud & DevOps**: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code

**Database Systems**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL

**Development Practices**: Agile/Scrum, Test-Driven Development, Code Review, Git Workflow

## Professional Experience

- [Experience Timeline](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#experience): Detailed work history and achievements

Key roles include developing enterprise-grade applications, leading technical teams, and implementing best practices for code quality, performance, and accessibility.

## Featured Projects

- [Projects Portfolio](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#projects): Live demos and GitHub repositories

Projects demonstrate expertise in:
- Building scalable web applications with React and TypeScript
- Implementing modern UI/UX patterns
- Cloud-native architecture and deployment
- Performance optimization and accessibility compliance
- Integration with third-party APIs and services

## Academic Publications

- [Publications](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#publications): Research papers and academic contributions

Publications in peer-reviewed journals covering topics in computer science, software engineering, and digital health technologies.

## Education & Certifications

- [Education](https://khalilcharfi.github.io/#education): Academic background and degrees

Academic background includes degrees from University of Sfax with focus on computer science and software engineering. Multiple certifications in e-health, digital technologies, and professional development.

## Technical Implementation

This portfolio is built with:
- **Frontend Framework**: React 18 with TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite for optimized bundling
- **3D Graphics**: Three.js with React Three Fiber
- **Internationalization**: i18next for multi-language support
- **Styling**: Modern CSS with custom properties
- **PWA Features**: Service worker and offline support
- **Performance**: Optimized code splitting and lazy loading
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant

## Languages Supported

- English (primary)
- Arabic
- French
- German

## Key Highlights

1. **Full-Stack Expertise**: Comprehensive experience across frontend, backend, and infrastructure
2. **Modern Tech Stack**: Proficient in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud technologies
3. **Scalable Solutions**: Track record of building high-performance, scalable applications
4. **Research Background**: Published academic research in computer science domains
5. **Continuous Learning**: Multiple certifications demonstrating ongoing professional development
